API Reference¶

cappuccino.filter_hotspots(hotspots, fch1, foff)[source]¶

Take out hotspots that are falling in especially heavy RFI

cappuccino.get_all_h5_files(target)[source]¶

We want to return groups of cadences

cappuccino.grab_node_file_list(data_dir, node_number)[source]¶

returns h5 and dat file path from given directory, ordered correctly

This is the main function.
